subject: p10402372
raw_hist: -year-old with bronchiectasis, increasing cough, concern about aspiration assess for interval change, check feeding tube. Comparison is made to the patients previous study dated. Portable AP upright chest film at 11:03 is submitted.
raw_impr: Dobbhoff feeding tube is seen coursing below the diaphragm with the tip not completely identified but positioned within the stomach proximally. It does not appear to be significantly changed. Bilateral lower lobe bronchiectasis is stable. No focal airspace consolidation is seen to suggest an acute pneumonia. No pleural effusions or pneumothoraces. Overall, cardiac and mediastinal contours are unchanged. Lungs remain hyperinflated.

No pleural effusions or pneumothoraces. Overall, cardiac and mediastinal contours are unchanged. Lungs remain hyperinflated.
